website_summaries.verdict: The epitome of classic  Timberland style and durability, this 6-inch premium boot is iconic for its style and genuine waterproof protection.
pros: Premium waterproof nubuck leather for comfort and durability
Abrasion-resistant.Durable laces with Taslan fibers for long-lasting wear
Padded collar offers comfortable, personalized fit
Leather lining provides durability and comfort
cons: Boots are heavy and not very soft

customer_reviews.title: Defective leaked
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for a trip that required lots of walking in the rain and these were advertised as waterproof. Needless to say I must have received a defective pair. My right boot leaked water and even looked different when wet see the photo attached. So I returned the first defective pair and ordered another pair, well how the heck about that pair came in a used box with scuffs along the sides of the boots! Come on guys seriously?!
customer_reviews.author: EKA

customer_reviews.title: Was 5 stars.....now 2..
customer_reviews.text: So cute. No scuffs. No scratches. Update: the inside bottom sole started lifting up after only 3x wearing them. Mind you I only wear these for leisure/fashion. I don't do any work or labor in them. And I only had them on no more than 2 hrs at a time. I really wanted to love these. But they have become uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: T.K

customer_reviews.title: These quickly became a daily favorite
customer_reviews.text: I was a little on the fence buying these boots online without trying them on first, but I figured, "what the heck, free shipping and returns." These boots are wonderful! There is a break-in period, so if you're worried that they're stiff or too tight, I'd give them a few days. Bottom line- there's a reason so many people love timbs- the quality truly can't be beat. If you're on the fence... just buy the boots. They're worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Sharp

customer_reviews.title: The look like the workboots that I have been wearing for years
customer_reviews.text: My daughter thinks these are a fashion statement. The look like the workboots that I have been wearing for years. Who would have known that I was cool way before my daughter discovered these..."NOT" she says. The are nice boots, a little pricing, but as you know Timberland has a great reputation and at 15 I hope she has stopped growing so she can wear these for a long time...or at least until they are not cool any more. ; )
customer_reviews.author: DRW

customer_reviews.title: FITS TO ACTUAL SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: FITS TO ACTUAL SIZE!! Contrary to what others have written, I found this boot true to fit. I took the advice from other reviewers and bought 1 size down which were to small.. I returned and reordered once again.. 1/2 size down; still to small. I returned once again and this time ordered my true size (9.5) and it fits perfectly. Excellent boot. Originally bought these for yard work; moving and stacking wood, repairing fence's etc. all of which required hours. These boots felt and fit great right out of the box. No break in period necessary. They are so sturdy and comfortableI I even throw them on to take the dogs through the woods.
customer_reviews.author: 19helen58

customer_reviews.title: My daughter liked these. I didn't realize they were coming from ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked these. I didn't realize they were coming from out of the country so they took a bit longer to get, but it wasn't too bad. They are good quality, and she wears them often... even though she does no construction ... and isn't a lumberjack...
customer_reviews.author: daocmom

customer_reviews.title: Run true to size and are fashionable.
customer_reviews.text: These run true to size for me. I wear size 8M and ordered 7.5M per the majority of reviews that stated they run large. Had to exchange for my size 8M. They feel a bit narrow in the toe box but, I'm hoping they will break in after some wear and stretch a bit. I bought these for fashion and not for work boots.
customer_reviews.author: T. Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, surprisingly stylish, will last forever.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted some of these shoes for years. I finally got some for hiking and discovered how cute that can be to wear every day with jeans etc. I wore them out one night and got so many compliments from men and women. Also I have a really bad back and these seem to help, some shoes make the back pain worse. Comfortable to wear for extended periods of time unlike the tactical boots I used to have to wear to work as a first responder. Super happy and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katja

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and all that jazz
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this.. unless they changed the description now . It said that it was steel toe. Super comfortable and all that jazz. I wore these for work out on the road I'm a female so i dont know much about work boots until this guy told me that timbs dont make steel toes and showed me the difference from my shoe and his shoe which his actually were steel toe. I felt embarrassed. And deff not comfy for work. I did however used it was an outfit for Halloween to look like a thug.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Fresh timbs are like a passage right to being from new york
customer_reviews.text: Every new yorker must have a pair of timbs right? Fresh constructs on a nice fall night. No complaints from me. Just buy your correct size and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Clay

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and ordered a 1/2 size smaller and they fit perfectly. I am normally a women's size 8.5, ordered a woman's size 8. My feet are fairly narrow too. If you intend to wear with thick socks, I would suggest ordering your regular size, however. Great product, exactly like the picture. I have not noticed squeaking like some reviews have mentioned and these are definitely real Timberlands.
customer_reviews.author: lifewithpnut

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: For the price i paid i was dissappointed. I expected better quality. I had always wanted a pair of tims, they looked a little scuffed around the sides, almost asif they had been used.for $169 i expected more. Dissappointed to say the least...
customer_reviews.author: Sonia B.

customer_reviews.title: love this boot!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size 5 (I'm a women's size 7) and the boots fit and look great. I got both medium and wide widths to compare and ended up going with the wide. My foot is slightly on the wider side, and while the medium width fit comfortably, it was much harder to put my foot into the shoe and I could tell I would have to break it in a little bit. The wide by comparison felt already broken in and had a good amount of room for my toes.
customer_reviews.author: nats91

customer_reviews.title: Perfect c:
customer_reviews.text: I looooove these boots they were too small but that's not their fault at all my feet are strange. These boots are made perfectly and are classy and nice and I would recommend them to literally everyone looking for boots. They respond quickly to questions and concerns and stuff gets taken care of. Great product and great service.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: The best boot. Function + Looks at a pretty reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST! Always my favorite shoes. Good for snow, good for rain, or anything really. I originally bought them for the snow (and cuz they look fly) but I wear them all the time. I didn't even need to break them in, which is so rare! I wear them all the time and they still look brand new, and whenever these wear out (which will probably be a lounge time from now) I'll definitely replace them. I even bought a pair for my boyfriend and we both look fly af.
customer_reviews.author: NKS

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really cute and pretty comfortable right out of the box. I would prefer a tad more support through the arches. Also, they are supposed to be insulated, however my feet were a bit chilly on a 24 degree day. They are extremely well made.
customer_reviews.author: deanna p.

customer_reviews.title: They are really bulky and feel a bit big. ...
customer_reviews.text: They are really bulky and feel a bit big. When I first started wearing them, my ankles would hurt from the weight of the shoe dragging my foot down as I walked. I also have really small ankles which makes the shoe look a bit odd if I don't style them properly because the shoe is big but my ankles are on the smaller side.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Saw these in DSW but at a higher price. So glad I checked Amazon. $25 less in price. Love the color. I don’t like wearing what everyone else wears. It’s great to be unique.
customer_reviews.author: NetAldene A

customer_reviews.title: A tad tight - overall great shoe
customer_reviews.text: They’re super cute and comfy when I don’t tighten the laces much. If I tighten them then my feet fall asleep because they cut off the circulation to my toes unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem with Product
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and noticed black spot on top of shoe, unhappy with product. I want a refund and the exact same shoes back
customer_reviews.author: Carlie Scacca

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the boots
customer_reviews.text: These RUN LARGE! I buy 91/2 or 10 and I am a size 91/2. I saw some people mention they ran a little big so I didn't size up. I should have bought a 81/2. 9 would have still been too big!!! LOVE the boots! I had these back in the 90's too :)
customer_reviews.author: Cfnkc

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was a little afraid to order these from Amazon since there seems to be a lot of fake shoes on here, but these are authentic Timberlands and fit perfectly. I wear a size 7 in women's & I consider my feet to be somewhat wide depending on the day. Sometimes my feet swell sometimes they're fine. These are like I went to a shoe store and tried them on. Perfect fit. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnee Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Your size mileage may vary
customer_reviews.text: I had a 5.5 pair of Tims from a loooong time ago so I got 5.5 of these. They turned out way too small, but then I got the 6 which was great. . A bummer to return but worth it. The back of heel pad is not something I usually like but this one doesn’t even register/feel like anything at all. Fits with thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs-plants-yoga

customer_reviews.title: I love them so much!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other Timberlands.. but nothing beats the original premium boots, the look, the fit, just classic, you can’t go wrong! Great price and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Uyen Mai Thi Tran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read most of the posts about sizing and I have to say it was not true for me. I wear a size 9 in women I order a size 9 for the boots and they were a true fit. So I don't understand what people are talking about they are a size bigger. I would trying them in a store first to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought some cheap knockoffs originally that broke as soon as I went to lace them, so I splurged on these. LOVE THEM! So high quality, true to size fit, I'm normally around a 6-7 in shoes (depending on how narrow the toe is) and I purchased these in a 6 after some debate and they are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Soliloquyq1111

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our daughter for Christmas. She usually wears a 9 1/2 or 10, we got her 9 1/2 she said they fit get and could even possibly wear a thicker sock if she needed to and they would still be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love it! Love it! I'm solid size 6 and I ordered 6 even some reviews say it runs half size bigger. Very glad I ordered the right size. Amazing boots! Wanted it for a long time. Definitely must have!.. Looking forward to buy a winter version :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One boot's insole feels weird like it isn't levelled properly
customer_reviews.text: I've own a pair of Timberlands that I purchased close to 10 years ago and the quality of them have changed quite a bit. Maybe it is because my old pair weighs more, I am convinced the quality changed. I purchased them online because I saw that they exist in a wide size. One boot's insole feels weird like it isn't levelled properly. It hurts the arch of one foot and I cannot wear it for a long time. But the non defective shoe feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Agh could not love these boots any more than I do
customer_reviews.text: Agh could not love these boots any more than I do!! Took one wear to get them comfortable, now they fit perfectly. I can do anything I like with the laces - including leaving them undone and they still stay put. I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Mendizabal

customer_reviews.title: ... than needed for my daughter and it was a perfect fit. She normally takes a 6
customer_reviews.text: Ordered half a size smaller than needed for my daughter and it was a perfect fit. She normally takes a 6, and 5.5 fit perfect. She wears very thin socks. She might have needed a 6 if she wore thicker socks. Not a work boot - a fashion item for her.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Only buy half a size down.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Im a 7 1/2 so I bought a 7 and it fits great although it is a little tight. I don't have wide feet but they aren't real slim. I don't think going a full size down is necessary. Maybe just half a size but if your feet are a little thick then get your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Gift for daughter
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter (4.0 student all year) it was the only thing she asked for and she loves them. A little more expensive via Amazon, but they were so hard to find I took a chance, but try and do a fitting in store for size b4 u order. Tried to buy them in store, but they would have to order them which would take a long time. I say that to say - very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Amazing All Around
customer_reviews.text: Great seller, boots arrived super fast. Have been wearing them for a long while now and they still feel great and look brand new! Quality boots!
customer_reviews.author: Bettie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I've received a lot of compliments on them too. I bought a half a size smaller than my usual. (I'm usually an 8, so bought 7.5). Still seems I could have bought a half a size smaller even...but I wear my shoes slightly snug. They still fit well though with my wool/cozy socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Heinen

customer_reviews.title: Order my normal size and it fits great
customer_reviews.text: These are really heavy shoes and they don’t give much support in my ankles when I’m walking. They are cute though. I did order my normal size and the shoe part fits perfect it’s just the loose ankles that make me nervous
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: She loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter in law as she is an electrician who went int9 business with my son
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Lake

customer_reviews.title: Its tinbs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my cousin cause I graduate college. She likes them, doesn't wear them cause afraid of staining them without protection.
customer_reviews.author: Ol' Brandito

customer_reviews.title: NO Timberland Box & Rapping!
customer_reviews.text: Looks & fits great. But plain brown box. When I buy my Timberland's from other stores,, They come in a Timberland Box & Rapping! I hope these are REAL TIMBS!
customer_reviews.author: jailee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They're kind of heavy but seems like good protection for my feet, and good grip for the ice and snow. I ended up with size 6, though I often wear 5.5.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs-plants-yoga

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: The product is a little tight around the toes due to the cut of the boot's tongue. I love them. I get compliments about them constantly. They are durable in bad weather, easy to clean, and stylish. A little difficult to tuck jeans into and have them stay in the boot (if not wearing skinny jeans) but it does not take away from the product.
customer_reviews.author: gmt22

customer_reviews.title: Had to break them in, but it was totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: They were definitely tight when I bought them, but within 2 weeks, wearing them a few hours everyday, they were stretched out very comfortably. If you don't wear work boots often, expect some blisters. But they just look so fresh, and are great for Ohio winters. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Krajci

customer_reviews.title: They are nice for price
customer_reviews.text: I got fat feet the left foot fits too tight the right fit just perfectly the top stich hurts but they was good price and quality
customer_reviews.author: shantell taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this boot. Gotta wear it to fit but should be normal as any other boot. The color is great and price to quality is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute! I had a pair of Tims for 17 years and they still look great. I saw these and I had to have them!
customer_reviews.author: SweetSarah

customer_reviews.title: ... of the look at first but now I'm in love. They look great
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of the look at first but now I'm in love. They look great, got scuffed pretty quickly but doesn't look bad at all. I wear them everywhere. Only problem I have is the top of my foot, the bump or bone or whatever its called - the shoe is quite hard and keeps pressing against it. I've tried tried to loosen the laces which helped a little. I think i just have to wait till they break in. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Kalsi

customer_reviews.title: order one size up, I'm an 8.
customer_reviews.text: order one size up, I'm an 8.5 and I ordered my size and they are little too snug with regular or thick socks
customer_reviews.author: Lysa

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots- practical too
customer_reviews.text: I just love these, so happy to find them in the wide width in a 6, the medium width I had tried was too tight, surprisingly. Anyway, these are so cute with my handmade socks.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baske

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes so much last year I just had to have the same pair again and when I saw them on here I was SO happy cause i couldn't find them at the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: First off the shipping was fantastic. They arrived in four days with standard shipping. I normally wear a size 8.5 so that's what I ordered and they fit fantastic. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: but she loved them. It didn't arrive on the day I ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to go a 1/2 size smaller for my daughter, but she loved them. It didn't arrive on the day I was told. Then I was told 3 more day and it arrived the next day. Confusing, but it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bidwill

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Not as heavy as I expected. Great price point and fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Dlewis95

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these boots yesterday and I am already in love. They fit true to size for me and are so comfortable. They fit perfect with my regular socks but also give enough room to wear thicker winter socks with them. I have big feet and I was very happy to find that they do not make my feet look HUGE like I had thought they might. While I didn't buy these boots to wear as work boots, they are very sturdy and don't feel super heavy on my feet, and the waterproofing makes them perfect for walking around in this pacific nw downpour
customer_reviews.author: PDMHC

customer_reviews.title: Actually was pretty surprised at how comfortable they are from what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually was pretty surprised at how comfortable they are from what I remember wearing them 20 years ago in NY I'm in Florida now and they are still as stylish and comfortable as always my foot grew and the size is as expected
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: what to buy when you have small feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter who wears a women's size 5. I did try the boys size 4 to save some money but they were too big in the heel and just too clunky looking on her small frame. I didn't want to pay $160.00 but I just thought it was not worth the $40 I was saving since she wears them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Angelplanet

customer_reviews.title: Take care when choosing a shoe width.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was extremely narrow, but seems to be loosening up the more I wear. Might be ready to accommodate winter socks.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver's mom

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: My 22 yr old daughter loved these and wore them a lot this past winter. She said they were comfortable, warm and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Tana Mashall

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for the fall
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots never have to worry about buying or sending these back. For years I had trouble finding the right ones and the sellers were lousy. Seller was awesome and the shoes are real and fit in my size. Don't need to move a size up buy your regular size shoe.
customer_reviews.author: LaQuisha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Teenager loves her Timberland boots!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Timberland boots. Normally wears a 7 but her foot runs wide so we purchased a 7.5 wide. They even arrived before scheduled due date so she could open for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timbos
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are amazing. But I did have to return bc I needed a wide. Which was a mistake on my end. However Tims are a timeless classic and everyone should have a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Joline

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my rural loving wife who loves these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Loursat

customer_reviews.title: I really really really love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I really really really love these boots. They're comfortable, soft, warm, etc. I just have to make sure I wear tall socks or the top of the boot rubs my ankle wrong, but I'll get used to it. One of the problems that bothers me, even though its so minute, is that one of the boot tongues is totally warped out of shape. No matter how I adjust the tongue it warps back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Looked great when they arrived except one boot did have marks on it. But they were too small. I ordered a 9.5 and received 6.5M and 5M junior. Great boot if they would have fit!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE BOOTS!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9 in women's, and I ordered these boots based on the reviews advising to order a half size smaller, which I did. I ordered the 8.5 and the fit is PERFECT! ***IF YOU ARE GOING TO WEAR THICK SOCKS WITH THESE BOOTS, ORDER YOUR ORIGINAL SIZE. IF YOU ARE GOING TO WEAR ONE PAIR OF REGULAR TUBE SOCKS THEN ORDER A HALF SIZE SMALLER*** My toes are flat and comfortable at a half size smaller, and are not crammed in the toe cap. I am very happy with these boots. The seller is TipTop Shoes here on Amazon. I will be purchasing from them again. A+++++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my daughter and she loves her boots!
customer_reviews.author: Germaine J.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: My usual shoe size is either a 7 or 7.5 so I was a little worried when I ordered a 7.5 (there were no more size 7 pairs left) that it would be big, but they fit perfectly! There's just enough extra room that I can wear socks with them comfortably without my feet feeling pinched or uncomfortable. Some reviews said that these are uncomfortable at first, so I was expecting them to be really painful at first, but they really aren't, but maybe that's because I haven't worn them or walked in them for an extended period of time. Anyway, I'm so glad I bought these. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Youngweon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Timberland boots for about 20 years. I live in Boston, MA and our winters can get pretty tough with lots of snow and ice so these boots are perfect for winter. I love the style and the rugged sole, I love the color, they fit perfectly. I wear a size 7.5 so I ordered my normal size and they fit great. They're always a little snug when I first buy them but with normal wear, they tend to relax after a while. Timberlands are my favorite boots for fall and winter.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Christmas present for my daughter. I've owned mine for almost 15 years and there still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: stevenW

customer_reviews.title: ... trip to Scandinavia that included hiking I found the perfect excuse to make the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a pair of Timberlands for a while now so when I booked a trip to Scandinavia that included hiking I found the perfect excuse to make the purchase. Upon receiving it in the mail and trying it on I found the fit to be a bit loose. I am always a size 5 and ordered as such. I think with a good pair of hiking socks it should fit just right. These shoes are the perfect balance of function and style.
customer_reviews.author: ddRn85

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good boots. after I order these boots I found a lower price at the boot outlet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I bought them just because I love ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I bought them just because I love the way they look. I was very surprised at how comfortable they were and I wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Timberland Boots Fit Well; Keep Feet Dry
customer_reviews.text: These boots were a gift for my daughter who tells me she is delighted. Boots fit her feet well, are sturdy and quite comfortable even when conditions are wet.
customer_reviews.author: Karen10527

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots!!! Sooooo many compliments on them. For me, they are very comfy with a great insole in them. Had no idea Timberlands were so comfortable. Will be buying more Timberland boots.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Bales

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: These are a little bit on the roomier side, but when tied tight, they are fine. These are incredibly comfortable. I wore them traveling all over Europe after only breaking in a couple of times and they never gave me any discomfort!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Knaggs

customer_reviews.title: So happy I ordered these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are even more beautiful in person than I anticipated. The quality is out of this world, and the fit is exactly as I expected when I ordered my size. I ordered through prime and these showed up on my doorstep without a hitch. I would highly recommend these shoes for hiking/outdoors or style!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Fit small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, but too narrow. I ordered my usual size 10.
customer_reviews.author: J. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great time DELIVERY... the produce la absolutely great and the best of all NOT FAKE
customer_reviews.author: Shadia Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: Have to be broken in a little but seem like a sturdy shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear when renovating a house. Had to break them in a little. One shoe hurt my ankle and the other was fine. Now that they are broken in they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: the boots fit perfect. do not be swayed by the B after the size. they fit good !!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth huggins

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 different kinds steel toe, the pro soft toe and premium wide, and all of them were too tight. The wide ones were even smaller then the pro soft toe regular. Very very disappointed. I keep wasting time and engery buying and returning them
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it was tight for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it was tight for my feet. It fits my friend really well so I'm glad I didn't have to purchase another birthday gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Fit is quite narrow.
customer_reviews.text: They are so nice looking, but the fir is quite narrow and after a short period of time, my feet hurt. Bummer really, as they are just such a fine looking pair of boots!
customer_reviews.author: The Home Show Hostess

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I waited 65 years for these boots! Well worth the wait! Great boots, for the price. I'd recommend these to anyone! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I wear between a 7.5-8 and ordered the 8 and they fit perfectly with boot socks.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: It’s like somebody has nipped off a piece
customer_reviews.text: The boots came with a big defect in the front of one boot as shown on the photo. It’s like somebody has nipped off a piece. So the whole impression is awful((( the boots are spoilt!
customer_reviews.author: Zus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are of good quality.Fit perfectly. I'm satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Yamil Sanabria

customer_reviews.title: recommending a wide!
customer_reviews.text: i have somewhat wide feet and these would pinch my feet and tighten my sock around my foot, making it very uncomfortable to wear. i returned these for a 9.5 wide instead of a 9 m i originally ordered and the wides fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa D.

customer_reviews.title: The boots are great and were delivered early which made my daughter happy
customer_reviews.text: The boots are great and were delivered early which made my daughter happy. Unfortunately they are too big. I've come to realize that it is probably best to find them in a store and try them on before buying them online.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected... I actually got a 1/2 size smaller since the reviews said they ran big and the smaller size fits fine. But the top of the boot rubs pretty badly on your foot. I think it's the line where the tongue and boot meets... It's just too tight there and even takes awhile to pull on & off because of this. Hopefully it will loosen up with time. Maybe if I had gotten my regular size, the rubbing wouldn't have been so noticeable. Idk.
customer_reviews.author: Teya

customer_reviews.title: I tried the size before I bought it online. ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried the size before I bought it online. I would say that buy a size smaller than the trainers you usually wear. For instance, I usually had size 40 for my nike/ adidas trainers, but I bought size 39 for this. BUT, if you compare with the boots you already had, i think the size is the same as I had a dr. martens boots in size 39.hope it helps, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted Timberlands but thought that they would be too narrow. I have bunions on both feet and decided to try out a 7 1/2 W. So glad I did... They are a perfect fit and very comfortable. I also like the way they look with joggers and khakis.
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: The boots are beautiful but had to return for another size. I wear a 5.5 - 6 but the 6 I ordered was too big. The 5.5 I have now are still on the big side- but perfect with heavy socks
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten L

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because i got the wrong size I normally wear size 6.5-7 and instead I got a child shoe I need some reimbursement for the $169 i paid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SHOE LOVER
customer_reviews.text: Love but tongue crinkles and kinda cuts into the front of the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Jory Menefee

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! My daughter loves them and says they fit well! Sizing is pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CONSTRUCTS.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my GF. She loved them and wore them all of the time. We got it for a great price, $99.
customer_reviews.author: KWAMA.

customer_reviews.title: Timberlands are the best
customer_reviews.text: I love my timberlands and wear them all the time. They are on the heavy side but they are comfortable so it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only con is i have flat feet and its a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: J-Hatchet

customer_reviews.title: Headline
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I wear these with wool socks and they keep my feet nice and warm! Good quality shoes! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ash R

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes. How they look, how they make me feel. These are the cadillac for your feet. Great buy. And they are the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: JenzFC

product_meta.title: Timberland Women's 6" Premium Waterproof Boots
product_meta.description: The epitome of classic style and durability, the 6" Premium boot is an undeniable style icon! Get your pair today! Premium waterproof nubuck leather for comfort, durability, and abrasion resistance. Durable laces with Taslan® fibers for long-lasting wear. Rustproof hardware for durability. Padded collar for a comfortable, personalized fit. Leather lining for durability and comfort. Padded footbed for added comfort. Waterproof direct-attach, seam-sealed construction for comfort and performance. Rubber lug outsole for superior traction. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 1 in Weight: 1 lb 4 oz Shaft: 6 in Product measurements were taken using size 6, width D - Wide. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Classic boot in waterproof leather featuring lace-up front with rustproof hexagonal eyelets and heavily-padded collar
